Title: Long live the People's Republic of China
Designer: Zhang Ruji (张汝济)Sheng Cijun (盛此君)Tian Yuwen (田郁文)
Publisher: Renmin meishu chubanshe (人民美术出版社)
Notes: This poster is the left-hand part of a three-poster set. The central poster, featuring Mao Zedong, unfortunately is not present in the collection. This is the left part, the right part is BG E13/886.
